game2D.objects

Class BackgroundObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • game2D.objects.GameObject
      • game2D.objects.BackgroundObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BigExplosion, BlockBreakable, BlockSolid, BorderWall, SmallExplosion

    public class BackgroundObject
extends GameObject
    Background objects are immovable objects of the game.
    Author:
    Fudou
